title: Sweet Sprinkles
description: Laughter filled memoriesLove, sweet, loveThis limited edition collection is the literary treat you’ve been craving.Full of hallmark feels and confectionery soup for the soul, each story sprinkles a little sugar into a world that needs more joy.Sisters and friends, mothers and daughters, two hearts bound by love— Sweet Sprinkles features an array of relationships built to withstand life’s bitter catastrophes.Satisfy your figurative sweet tooth. Scroll up and one click now.
author: Jennifer M. Miller
